channel.title: ::master help?
channel.description: i want it so if a admin types ::master it will give them all max stats but i want it so only admins can do it. what would be the code?? :confused:

item.title: ::master help?
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”)){
for (int i=0; i<20; i++){
addSkillXp(13500000,i);
}
}

God people learn how to make commands

item.title: ::master help?
item.dc:creator: @Demi_Sphere Demi Sphere
item.description:
@Demi_Sphere wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); addSkillXP(14910000, 3); addSkillXP(14910000, 4); addSkillXP(14910000, 5); addSkillXP(14910000, 6); addSkillXP(14910000, 7); addSkillXP(14910000, 8); addSkillXP(14910000, 9); addSkillXP(14910000, 10); addSkillXP(14910000, 11); addSkillXP(14910000, 12); addSkillXP(14910000, 13); addSkillXP(14910000, 14); addSkillXP(14910000, 15); addSkillXP(14910000, 16); addSkillXP(14910000, 17); addSkillXP(14910000, 18); addSkillXP(14910000, 19); addSkillXP(14910000, 20); addSkillXP(14910000, 21); addSkillXP(14910000, 22); addSkillXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" Mastered.."); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2008, 02:38:11 PM[/size][hr]Mine does all stats btw.

item.title: ::master help?
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2) {
addSkillXP(14910000, 0);
addSkillXP(14910000, 1);
addSkillXP(14910000, 2);
addSkillXP(14910000, 3);
addSkillXP(14910000, 4);
addSkillXP(14910000, 5);
addSkillXP(14910000, 6);
sendMessage("" + playerName + " … your a nerd.");

highlight ur master and put this in instead
